home.title: In Memory of Those We Lost
home.subtitle: We won't forget, we won't forgive
home.description: A platform to document victims, identify perpetrators, and preserve evidence from Iran's revolution. This site is to record all who stood in front of Iranians. Community-driven, open-source, and dedicated to preserving the truth.
home.whyJavidanText: Javidan (جاویدان - eternal) is an open-source, crowd-sourced memorial dedicated to documenting and honoring those who lost their lives during Iran's ongoing revolution. We believe in transparency, community verification, and preserving the truth for future generations.
home.footer: Open-source and community-driven. In memory of those we lost.
